title: Template Registry
description: Central registry for all universal documentation templates with metadata and usage tracking

template_entry.template_id: string - Unique identifier for the template
template_entry.name: string - Human-readable template name
template_entry.file_path: string - Relative path to template file
template_entry.description: string - Purpose and usage of this template
template_entry.project_types: array - List of project types this template applies to (python|javascript|react|nextjs|fastapi|django|universal)
template_entry.placeholders: array - List of placeholder objects with name and description
template_entry.required_placeholders: array - List of placeholder names that MUST be filled
template_entry.optional_placeholders: array - List of placeholder names that are optional
template_entry.dependencies: array - List of template_ids that should exist before using this template
template_entry.usage_count: integer - Number of times this template has been used
template_entry.last_used: ISO 8601 timestamp - When template was last instantiated
template_entry.created_at: ISO 8601 timestamp - When template was added to registry
template_entry.created_by: string - Agent or user who created the template
template_entry.validation_rules: object - Rules for validating filled templates
template_entry.example_output: string - Path to example of filled template
template_entry.version: string - Semantic version of the template
